Article.Title: No Stoned Unturned and Alolan Exeggutor

Text.p:
With the No Stone Unturned event, several Pokemon are now available as shiny!
And, there are new Shopping Boxes and Raid Bosses!
Also, the Alolan form of the Exeggutor is now available!

The various charts have been updated with the new stuff:
Move Sets
Pokemon Chart
Pokemon Quick List
